unicef-cp4.def: Percentage of women 20–24 years old who were first married or in union before they were 15 years old; percentage of women 20–24 years old who were first married or in union before they were 18 years old; percentage of men 20–24 years old who were first married or in union before they were 18 years old.
unicef-cp4.name: Child marriage
unicef-cp4.source: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: February 2021.
